ygData.subject: Re: Alenia's Disenchanting Melody
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, too bad it doesn t get rid of the walking sleep line of spells. I tried using it last night in Highkeep, those silly pickclaws like to cast Walking Sleep
ygData.messageBody:
Cool, too bad it doesn't get rid of the walking sleep line of spells. I
tried using it last night in Highkeep, those silly pickclaws like to cast
Walking Sleep and Tashers (sp?) Insects on everyone. And ADM does not remove
that effect :(


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti


>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Alenia's Disenchanting Melody
>Date: Wed, 25 Aug 1999 10:10:05 -0700
>
>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
>If anyone has fought Lord Grimrot when he is carrying the Opal
>Scythe, you know how devasting his debuffs and DoTs can be.
>
>Steal Strength
>Heat Blood
>Disease Cloud
>
>Enter Alenia's Disenchanting Melody... Not only did this song
>cancel the debuffs, but it eliminated the DoTs as well. This
>song does indeed work as intended as a Party: Cancel Magic
>effect. It left my Valor, Guard, and Endure Magic untouched.
>
>Very good song to weave when fighting SKs or necros that use
>their dark magic.
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 30th drummer.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
